biotools.summary: Python module for Humphrey Visual Field (HVF) report data extraction. The package can taken in HVF single field analysis report images (from HFA2 or HFA3), and using OCR (tesseract) and image processing techniques (openCV), extracts data into an object oriented format for further processing.

bioschemas.name: hvf_extraction_script

The package can taken in HVF single field analysis report images (from HFA2 or HFA3), and using OCR (tesseract) and image processing techniques (openCV), extracts data into an object oriented format for further processing.
